post.title: 9 Ways to Win a Hackathon... Without Coming in First Place
post.description: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.
post.excerpt: Originally posted at  https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/how-to-win-a-hackathon From my experience at hackathons, I understand that it’s not…
